message.raw:
* now requires a new version of GMTK (at least 0.1 f6e7c01e2b27 (ticket161)) for increased speed
* segway: covariances have TEMPORARILY been untied until they are supported again in the new GMTK
* segway: MC/MX/REAL_MAT direct parameters are no longer trained (MEAN/COVAR/DENSECPT parameters are)
* test: update for new GMTK
